Text: Holiday Escape Fares from AirTran AirwaysWhat Holiday Escape Fares When Travel December and January Where Domestic United States How go to and purchase these specials at least day in advance of departure but no later than December A few sample markets are listed below Go to and search our reservation system to find your destination Sample Markets Atlanta BaltimoreWashington BWI Airport Atlanta Houston Hobby Airport Atlanta MinneapolisSt Paul Atlanta Pittsburgh Atlanta Washington DC Dulles Airport Boston BaltimoreWashington BWI Airport BuffaloNiagara New Orleans Chicago Midway Airport SavannahHilton Head Myrtle Beach Philadelphia Memphis RaleighDurham Remember Travel on the above fares may originate in either city and all fares are oneway and dont require roundtrip purchase Holiday Escape Fares other rules and restrictions All fares are oneway All fares are nonrefundable and a per person fee applies to any change made after purchase plus any applicable increase in airfare Fares are valid for travel December and January Fares may not be available on all flights or travel days of high demand Holiday Escapes may be combined with other fares in order to complete an itinerary Fares must be purchased by December Previously purchased tickets cannot be exchanged for lower priced Internet fares Special Internet fares are only available for purchase on our web site Seats are limited and subject to availability Fares dont include segment fees of per segment A segment is defined as a takeoff and landing Airport passenger facility charges of up to are not included As a subscriber to AirTran Airways Net Escapes we send you regular updates on our Internet specials If you need to contact us for any other reason please call us at AIRTRAN or in Atlanta call Please note that any reference to Net Escapes fares Feature City fares or bonus discounts for booking online may ONLY be purchased on our web site Please click UMUaspB and you will be removed immediately Or To unsubscribe mailto or if the emailaddress is not clickable simply copy the text to the right of the mailto command and paste it into your email application and hit send You will be taken off the list immediately Thank you
